about_the_game:
Echoes of the House

А short, linear psychological horror game that plunges the player into a haunting mystery. The story follows Christopher, who arrives at his grandmother's remote countryside home for what should be an ordinary visit. However, strange occurrences quickly reveal that nothing is as it seems, with the eerie atmosphere building as players uncover deeper, unsettling layers to the narrative. The game uses psychological tension to create a chilling and immersive experience. All within a one-hour playthrough.

Gameplay

This game mainly features a first-person narrative experience that involves exploration, conversations, and engaging gameplay elements.

Key Features

  • Psychological Horror: A deeply unsettling atmosphere where tension builds as reality distorts, keeping players on edge.

  • Story-Driven Experience: A focused, one-hour experience with a tight narrative, delivering a powerful and immersive story without distractions.

  • Creepy Rural Setting: Explore an eerie, isolated countryside house filled with secrets that unravel the further you investigate.

  • Unexpected Twists: The story goes beyond what meets the eye, offering surprising revelations and hidden depths.

This makes the game perfect for horror fans seeking a quick yet intense and story-rich experience.

Includes artificial intelligence voiceovers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Targeting low to medium settings at 1080p, 30-50 FPS. SSD preferred.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 (8GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD preferred.

short_description: Christopher arrives at his grandmother's countryside home late at night for a seemingly ordinary visit. But soon after reuniting, he begins to notice something isn't right. The familiar setting warps into a place of unease, and the mystery that unravels is far more complex than anyone could expect.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
